name: Panini
description: A flat file compiler that powers our prototyping template. Create pages with consistent layouts and reusable partials with ease.

name: Inky
description: Inky is a templating language that converts simple HTML tags into the complex table HTML required for emails.

name: Media Queries
description: Use media queries to design responsive HTML emails that work in any email client.

name: Visibility Classes
description: Selectively show content for different screen sizes.

name: Tips & Tricks
description: We've put together some Responsive Emails Tips & Tricks that will help you navigate the mine field that is coding HTML emails.

name: Thumbnail
description: Spruce up an image tag with our thumbnail style.

name: CSS with Inky
description: Coding with Inky is easy and fun! Because some of the CSS classes are generated by Inky, we created a guide to help you style your email.

name: Spacer
description: Vertical spacing in emails is inconsistent. The spacer component will help you create the space you need, the same on every device and client.

name: Using Sass
description: Foundation for Emails is written in Sass, which allows us to make the codebase customizable and flexible.

name: Getting Started with Sass
description: Get started with the Sass-powered ZURB Stack for writing HTML emails.

name: Alignment
description: Centering, images, text, buttons, and menus in HTML emails made easy.

name: Foundation for Emails 2 Migration Guide
description: This guide describes the changes required to migrate a Foundation for Emails template from version 1 (formerly Ink) to Foundation for Emails 2.

name: Wrapper
description: Wrapper creates the necessary structure to wrap elements so that full width backgrounds can be applied.

name: Foundation for Emails
description: Use Foundation for Emails to design responsive HTML emails that work in any email client.

name: Getting Started with the Ruby Gem
description: inky-rb is a gem that allows you to bring the power of Foundation for Emails into your Rails apps. It can be embedded into the Asset Pipeline, combining with a CSS inliner to let you generate awesomely responsive HTML emails that work across various clients.

name: Getting Started with CSS
description: Get started with the CSS version of Foundation for Emails.

name: Compatibility
description: Foundation for Emails is battle-tested in the trickiest email clients, like Microsoft Outlook.

name: Global Styles
description: Our global CSS includes helpful resets to ensure consistent styling across email clients.

name: The Grid
description: If you're familiar with the Foundation for Sites grid, you'll be right at home working with Foundation for Emails.

name: Callout
description: Formerly panels, callouts can be used to create sidebar panels or call out important content in an email.

name: Button
description: Buttons are convenient tools when you need more traditional actions. To that end, Foundation has many easy to use button styles that you can customize or override to fit your needs.

name: Menu
description: Use the menu component to create a horizontal or vertical list of links.

name: Typography
description: Typography in Foundation for Emails is meant to make your life easier by providing clean, attractive, simple default styles for all of the most basic typographical elements.

name: $callout-background-fade
description: Fade value for callout backgrounds.

name: $callout-border
description: Border around a callout.

name: $primary-color
description: Primary color for interactive components like links and buttons.

name: $secondary-color
description: Secondary color, used with components that support the .secondary` class.

name: $success-color
description: Color to indicate a positive status or action, used with the .success` class.

name: $warning-color
description: Color to indicate a caution status or action, used with the .warning` class.

name: $alert-color
description: Color to indicate a negative status or action, used with the .alert` class.

name: $light-gray
description: Color used for light gray UI items within Foundation.

name: $medium-gray
description: Color used for medium gray UI items within Foundation.

name: $dark-gray
description: Color used for dark gray UI items within Foundation.

name: $black
description: Color used for black ui items within Foundation

name: $white
description: Color used for white ui items within Foundation

name: $pre-color
description: Color used code.

name: $global-width
description: Width of the container.

name: $global-width-small
description: Width of the container on small screens.

name: $global-gutter
description: Gutter for grid elements.

name: $body-background
description: Body background color.

name: $container-background
description: Color for the container background

name: $global-padding
description: Global padding.

name: $global-margin
description: Global margin. Margin requires a capital 'M' to workin Outlook.com

name: $global-radius
description: Global radius of radius-corners.

name: $global-rounded
description: Global rounded radius of rounded-corners.

name: $global-breakpoint
description: Global media query to switch from desktop to mobile styles.

name: $callout-border-success
description: Border around a callout with the .success` class.

name: $grid-column-count
description: Default number of columns for an email.

name: $column-padding-bottom
description: Default padding for the bottom of a column.

name: $container-radius
description: Default border radius for the container. Use a px value

name: $callout-background
description: Background color of a callout.

name: $callout-border-warning
description: Border around a callout with the .warning` class.

name: $callout-border-alert
description: Border around a callout with the .alert` class.

name: $callout-margin-bottom
description: Bottom margin of a callout.

name: $menu-item-padding
description: Padding inside a menu item.

name: $menu-item-gutter
description: Right-hand spacing of items in menus with the .simple` class.

name: $menu-item-color
description: This is the color of the menu item links.

name: $button-rounded
description: Border radius of rounded buttons. Not supported by all email clients.

name: $button-radius
description: Border radius of buttons. Not supported by all email clients.

name: $button-border
description: Border around buttons.

name: $callout-border-secondary
description: Border around a callout with the .success` class.

name: $button-margin
description: Margin around buttons.

name: $button-font-weight
description: Font weight of buttons.

name: $button-color-alt
description: Text color of buttons with a light background.

name: $button-color
description: Text color of buttons.

name: $callout-padding
description: Padding inside a callout.

name: $global-font-color
description: Global font color.

name: $body-font-family
description: Global font family.

name: $global-font-weight
description: Global font weight.

name: $header-color
description: Header color

name: $global-line-height
description: Global line height.

name: $global-font-size
description: Font size of body text.

name: $body-line-height
description: Line height of body text.

name: $header-font-family
description: Font family of headings.

name: $header-font-weight
description: Font family of headings.

name: $h1-font-size
description: Font size of <h1>` elements.

name: $h2-font-size
description: Font size of <h2>` elements.

name: $h3-font-size
description: Font size of <h3>` elements.

name: $h4-font-size
description: Font size of <h4>` elements.

name: $h5-font-size
description: Font size of <h5>` elements.

name: $h6-font-size
description: Font size of <h6>` elements.

name: $header-margin-bottom
description: Margin bottom of <h1>` through `<h6>` elements.

name: $paragraph-margin-bottom
description: Margin bottom of paragraphs.

name: $small-font-size
description: Default font size for <small>`.

name: $small-font-color
description: Color of <small>` elements when placed inside headers.

name: $lead-font-size
description: Font size of lead paragraphs.

name: $lead-line-height
description: Line height of lead paragraphs.

name: $text-padding
description: Padding inside paragraphs.

name: $subheader-lineheight
description: Default line height for subheaders.

name: $subheader-color
description: Default font color for subheaders.

name: $subheader-font-weight
description: Default font weight for subheaders.

name: $subheader-margin-top
description: Default top margin for subhheaders.

name: $subheader-margin-bottom
description: Default bottom margin for subheaders.

name: $hr-width
description: Maximum width of a divider.

name: $hr-border
description: Default border for a divider.

name: $hr-margin
description: Default margin for a divider.

name: $anchor-text-decoration
description: Text decoration for anchors.

name: $anchor-color
description: Text color of anchors.

name: $anchor-color-visited
description: Text color of anchors to visited links.

name: $anchor-color-hover
description: Text color of anchors on hover.

name: $anchor-color-active
description: Text color of active anchors.

name: $stat-font-size
description: Default font size for statistic numbers.

name: $button-font-size
description: Font sizes of buttons at various sizes.

name: $button-padding
description: Padding inside buttons at various sizes.

name: $button-background
description: Background color of buttons.
